About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

Specifically what i set out to do with Web Development, game testing was just a completely makeeyes-wide-open-focus on the game just being fun while Streaming and playing it. There's no sense of hubris about the grand design or anything about it, or trying to impose a story or a tale on top of all this. It's looking at a game in its fundamental sense of what you're doing has to be fun. It's not a matter of beating the game into submission or accomplishing something, the actions have to be fun. There has to be something that you wanna just go out and do. People don't play softball because they want to beat the game of softball; it has to be an action that's fun by itself. I think that i succeeded in a lot of ways there.
